subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets made a season-high 15 3-pointers in a 97-85 victory over the Raptors in Toronto, ending a six-game losing streak and winning for the first time since their opener Dec. 26.
snippet: The Nets made a season-high 15 3-pointers in a 97-85 victory over the Raptors in Toronto, ending a six-game losing streak and winning for the first time since their opener Dec. 26.
